//Generated by BehavEd

set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "OFF" );

task ( "down" )
{
	set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Stationary|Full+None+Soldier+Prone|Breathe" );
}

dowait ( "down" );

task ( "get up" )
{
	set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Get up - prone to crouch" );
}

dowait ( "get up" );
set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "ON" );
